extension.summary: A PVR-oriented skin for Kodi. (Specifically MythTV, maybe others?)
extension.description: This is a mod of Maximinimalism which is more PVR-centric. Maximinimalism is a lightweight, clean and simple XBMC experience designed for maximum usability and minimum fuss.
